siteDescription: Versatile software engineer with a professional focus on full-stack development for web and mobile applications. I have 12 years of experience as a web engineer across e-commerce (Eponym), booking (ZocDoc), EdTech (Aktiv Learning and The Databyss Foundation), Social (Skilltype) and commercial (Ogilvy). My skill set spans 0-1 prototyping, digital product launches, full- stack engineering on Node/React stack, interactive systems (Unity), and I have an M.Sc. in user research for interactive systems.
title: Paul
Hine
intro: Software Engineer with a focus on full-stack development for web and mobile applications.
